newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Feb 19.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Feb 19.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The Gulf Aircraft Maintenance Co won a $47 million maintenance contract with the British Royal Airforce.
- Yemen plans to issue a 1,000 riyal note in 1998.
- Tunisia's industrial exports in 1996 increased by 3.8 percent, a study showed.
- Egypt is to invest $600 million in four new paper projects.
- Iraq's income from oil after the implementation of the oil-for-food deal reached $650 million, the commerce minister said.
- Jordan is to set up an electricity firm with capital of five million dinars.
